definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: quiver, shake, reel (Aram. [[רְעַל]], r9el, quiver, shake, tremble; Ar. ra9lun the hanging part of a sheep's split ear, also (Frey) a kind of veil of which a part hangs down in front; 0’ar9ala dangling; Liḥy. has n.pr. [[רעל]] DHM:Epigr. Denkm. Ar. 38);—

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[הַבְּרשְׁים]] [[הָרְעָָלוּ]] Na 2:4 are made to quiver. Vid. also [[[עָרַל]]].
